tool_description: Safeguard your business from cyber threats with our easy-to-integrate API. Get real-time updates on malicious IPs, risky domains, and dangerous URLs—all in one place. Add it to your firewall and security devices, and monitor them using SIEM.
name: Stay Safe: Threat Intel API
title: Stay Safe: Threat Intel API

api_list.name: /get_domains
api_list.description: Get a list of malicious domains
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stay-safe-threat-intel-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stay-safe-threat-intel-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /get_ips
